name: British and Irish Association of Zoos and Aquariums
goal: BIAZA is the professional association for zoos and aquariums within the UK and Ireland.  We work to lead and support our members to achieve their goals in animal welfare, conservation, education and research.  We provide a range of resources for our members to ensure that they achieve the highest levels of professional excellence possible.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
EU zoos directive
EU invasive alien species directive
EU habitats directive
EU birds directive
